languages.text: Спокойствие варп-перелета было нарушено сообщениями о пугающих звуках и видениях, что посещают команду. Сотни людей сообщают о стуках и криках из-за переборок пустотного корабля, звуках скрежещущих по обшивке ногтей и долговязых, напоминающих ксеносов-эльдаров тенях, мечущихся по длинным коридорам. Сильнее всего феномены проявлялись в отдаленном углу офицерской палубы — там, где нашла пристанище новая спутница Лорд-капитана по имени Ирлиэт.

traits.locale_text: Спокойствие варп-перелета было нарушено сообщениями о пугающих звуках и видениях, что посещают команду. Сотни людей сообщают о стуках и криках из-за переборок пустотного корабля, звуках скрежещущих по обшивке ногтей и долговязых, напоминающих ксеносов-эльдаров тенях, мечущихся по длинным коридорам. Сильнее всего феномены проявлялись в отдаленном углу офицерской палубы — там, где нашла пристанище новая спутница Лорда-капитана по имени Ирлиэт.

languages.text: The tranquillity of the warp jump was disturbed by reports of frightening sounds and visions that descended upon the crew. Hundreds of people reported knocking and screaming behind the bulkheads of the void vessel, the sound of nails scratching against the hull and the elongated Aeldari-like shadows thrashing about the long passageways. The phenomena were most prominent in the far corner of the officer deck where the new Lord Captain's companion, named Yrliet, had made her home.
languages.original_text: Спокойствие варп-перелета было нарушено сообщениями о пугающих звуках и видениях, что посещают команду. Сотни людей сообщают о стуках и криках из-за переборок пустотного корабля, звуках скрежещущих по обшивке ногтей и долговязых, напоминающих ксеносов-эльдаров тенях, мечущихся по длинным коридорам. Сильнее всего феномены проявлялись в отдаленном углу офицерской палубы — там, где нашла пристанище новая спутница Лорд-капитана по имени Ирлиэт.

traits.locale_text: The tranquility of the warp voyage was disturbed by reports of frightening sounds and visions that descended upon the crew. Hundreds of people reported knocking and screaming behind the bulkheads of the void vessel, the sound of nails scratching against the hull and the lanky Aeldari-like shadows thrashing about the long corridors. The phenomena were most prominent in the far corner of the officer deck where the new Lord Captain's companion named Yrliet made her home.

Hundreds of people reported knocking and screaming behind the bulkheads of the void vessel, the sound of nails scratching against the hull and the elongated Aeldari-like shadows thrashing about the long passageways. The phenomena were most prominent in the far corner of the officer deck where the new Lord Captain's companion, named Yrliet, had made her home.

languages.text: 安宁的亚空间跳跃之旅被打破了。报告显示，有船员听到了可怕的声音，看到了古怪的幻象。数以百计的人声称，他们听到虚空舰的舱壁后面传来敲击声、尖叫声，以及仿佛钉子刮擦船体的声音，还亲眼目睹了形似艾达灵族的细长影子在狭长的通道上徘徊。这些异状现象发生最频繁的区域，是领主舰长的新同伴，伊莉耶特所在军官甲板的偏僻角落。
languages.original_text: The tranquillity of the warp jump was disturbed by reports of frightening sounds and visions that descended upon the crew. Hundreds of people reported knocking and screaming behind the bulkheads of the void vessel, the sound of nails scratching against the hull and the elongated Aeldari-like shadows thrashing about the long passageways. The phenomena were most prominent in the far corner of the officer deck where the new Lord Captain's companion, named Yrliet, had made her home.

traits.locale_text: 安宁的亚空间跳跃之旅被打破了。报告显示，有船员听到了可怕的声音，看到了古怪的幻象。数以百计的人声称，他们听到虚空舰的舱壁后面传来敲击声、尖叫声，以及仿佛钉子刮擦船体的声音，还亲眼目睹了形似艾达灵族的细长影子在狭长的通道上徘徊。这些异状现象发生最频繁的区域，是领主舰长的新同伴，伊莉耶特所在军官甲板的偏僻角落。

languages.text: La tranquilidad del salto de disformidad se vio perturbada por los informes de aterradores sonidos y visiones que se apoderaron de la tripulación. Cientos de personas informaron de golpes y gritos detrás de los muros de la nave del vacío, del sonido de clavos arañando el casco y de sombras alargadas parecidas a las de los Aeldari revoloteando por los largos pasillos. Los fenómenos eran más frecuentes en el rincón más alejado de la cubierta de oficiales, donde la compañera {mf|del nuevo|de la nueva} Lord Capitán, llamada Yrliet, había establecido su hogar.
languages.original_text: The tranquillity of the warp jump was disturbed by reports of frightening sounds and visions that descended upon the crew. Hundreds of people reported knocking and screaming behind the bulkheads of the void vessel, the sound of nails scratching against the hull and the elongated Aeldari-like shadows thrashing about the long passageways. The phenomena were most prominent in the far corner of the officer deck where the new Lord Captain's companion, named Yrliet, had made her home.

traits.locale_text: La tranquilidad del viaje por la disformidad se vio perturbada por los informes de aterradores sonidos y visiones que se apoderaron de la tripulación. Cientos de personas informaron de golpes y gritos detrás de los muros de la nave del vacío, del sonido de clavos arañando el casco y de sombras alargadas parecidas a las de los Aeldari revoloteando por los largos pasillos. Los fenómenos eran más frecuentes en el rincón más alejado de la cubierta de oficiales, donde la compañera {mf|del nuevo|de la nueva} Lord Capitán, llamada Yrliet, había establecido su hogar.

languages.text: <歪み>の中を渡る静かな空気が、恐ろしい音とビジョンがクルーの間で問題になっているという報告で壊される。何百人もの者達が、ヴォイドシップの壁の後ろから響くノック音や叫び声、釘が船体を引っ掻く音を聞き、長い通路をバタバタと動く細長いアエルダリに似た影を見たと主張した。この現象は、ユリエットという名の新しいロード・キャプテンの仲間が家を建てた、士官デッキのずっと端の方でよく起こっている。
languages.original_text: The tranquillity of the warp jump was disturbed by reports of frightening sounds and visions that descended upon the crew. Hundreds of people reported knocking and screaming behind the bulkheads of the void vessel, the sound of nails scratching against the hull and the elongated Aeldari-like shadows thrashing about the long passageways. The phenomena were most prominent in the far corner of the officer deck where the new Lord Captain's companion, named Yrliet, had made her home.

traits.locale_text: <歪み>の中を渡る静かな空気が、恐ろしい音とビジョンがクルーの間で問題になっているという報告で壊される。何百人もの者達が、ヴォイドシップの壁の後ろから響くノック音や叫び声、釘が船体を引っ掻く音を聞き、長い通路をバタバタと動く細長いアエルダリに似た影を見たと主張した。この現象は、ユリエットという名の新しいロード・キャプテンの仲間が家を建てた、士官デッキのずっと端の方でよく起こっている。

languages.text: Le paisible passage dans le Warp est perturbé par des rapports faisant état de terribles bruits et visions qui affligent l'équipage. Des centaines de personnes signalent des coups et des cris derrière les cloisons, des bruits ressemblant à des griffes s'attaquant à la coque et des ombres filiformes semblables à celles des Aeldaris qui s'agitent le long des couloirs. Les phénomènes se manifestent le plus souvent à l'extrémité du pont des officiers, où Yrliet, votre nouvelle camarade, a élu domicile.
languages.original_text: The tranquillity of the warp jump was disturbed by reports of frightening sounds and visions that descended upon the crew. Hundreds of people reported knocking and screaming behind the bulkheads of the void vessel, the sound of nails scratching against the hull and the elongated Aeldari-like shadows thrashing about the long passageways. The phenomena were most prominent in the far corner of the officer deck where the new Lord Captain's companion, named Yrliet, had made her home.

traits.locale_text: Le paisible passage dans le Warp est perturbé par des rapports faisant état de terribles bruits et visions qui affligent l'équipage. Des centaines de personnes signalent des coups et des cris derrière les cloisons, des bruits ressemblant à des griffes s'attaquant à la coque et des ombres filiformes semblables à celles des Aeldaris qui s'agitent le long des couloirs. Les phénomènes se manifestent le plus souvent à l'extrémité du pont des officiers, où Yrliet, la nouvelle camarade {mf|du seigneur-capitaine|de la seigneure-capitaine}, a élu domicile.

languages.text: Die Stille des Warpsprungs wird durch Berichte von furchterregenden Geräuschen und Visionen unterbrochen, welche der Crew Angst machen. Hunderte von Crewmitgliedern berichten von Klopfgeräuschen und Schreien hinter den Schotten des Raumschiffs, von dem Geräusch von Fingernägeln, die am Rumpf kratzen, und von langgezogenen Aeldari-ähnlichen Schatten, die durch die langen Gänge hetzen. Am stärksten waren die Phänomene in der hinteren Ecke des Offiziersdecks zu beobachten, wo Yrliet ihre Kabine hat, die neue Gefährtin des Lord Captains.
languages.original_text: The tranquillity of the warp jump was disturbed by reports of frightening sounds and visions that descended upon the crew. Hundreds of people reported knocking and screaming behind the bulkheads of the void vessel, the sound of nails scratching against the hull and the elongated Aeldari-like shadows thrashing about the long passageways. The phenomena were most prominent in the far corner of the officer deck where the new Lord Captain's companion, named Yrliet, had made her home.

Die Stille der Warpreise wird durch Berichte von furchterregenden Geräuschen und Visionen unterbrochen, welche der Crew Angst machen. Hunderte von Crewmitgliedern berichten von Klopfgeräuschen und Schreien hinter den Schotten des Raumschiffs, von dem Geräusch von Fingernägeln, die am Rumpf kratzen, und von langgezogenen Aeldari-ähnlichen Schatten, die durch die langen Gänge hetzen. Am stärksten waren die Phänomene in der hinteren Ecke des Offiziersdecks zu beobachten, wo Yrliet ihre Kabine hat, die neue Gefährtin des Lord Captains.

languages.text: Öte sıçramanın huzuru, mürettebatı dehşete düşüren sesler ve görüntülerle bozuldu. Yüzlerce kişi; uçsuz gemisinin bölme panellerinin ardından gelen vurma ve çığlık seslerini, gövdeyi tırmalayan tırnak seslerini ve uzun koridorlarda dolaşan Aeldari benzeri gölgelerin çırpınışlarını raporladı. Bu fenomenler en çok yeni Lord Kaptan'ın Yrliet adındaki yoldaşının yaşadığı, subay güvertesinin uzak köşesinde görüldü.
languages.original_text: The tranquillity of the warp jump was disturbed by reports of frightening sounds and visions that descended upon the crew. Hundreds of people reported knocking and screaming behind the bulkheads of the void vessel, the sound of nails scratching against the hull and the elongated Aeldari-like shadows thrashing about the long passageways. The phenomena were most prominent in the far corner of the officer deck where the new Lord Captain's companion, named Yrliet, had made her home.
